org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: As the answer passes your lips, you feel the floor vibrate faintly.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: {0} whispers something, and you feel the floor vibrate faintly.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: You push the protruding stone into it's recess...
As you push the protruding stone into it's recess, you feel the floor vibrate faintly.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye, and feel the floor vibrate faintly.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: As the answer passes your lips, the northern wall slides silently into the ceiling.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: {0} whispers something, and you feel the floor vibrate faintly.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: You kiss the princess and her eyes flutter open. She springs from the bed, takes a quick look around, and flees the room!
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye. The princess suddenly springs from the bed, takes a quick look around, and flees the room!

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: As you pull the lever, a trap door opens up beneath you!
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: {0} has just fallen into a trap door in the floor!

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: As the answer passes your lips a voice in your mind says: "Correct... Now complete the riddle to gain passage..."
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: {0} whispers something, then pauses for a moment as if in deep thought...

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: As the answer passes your lips, your surroundings fade...

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: As the answer passes your lips, you hear a faint clicking sound.
After a quarter turn clockwise, the anvil returns to it's previous position following a faint click.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: After pulling down the arm of the statue, it returns to it's previous position following a faint click.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: After rotating the statues' sceptre, it returns to its previous position following a faint click.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: After closing the jaws of the statue of the statue, they return to their previous position following a faint click.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye.

org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__playerMessage: After straightening the shield, it returns to its previous position following a faint click.
org.tdod.ether.taimpl.cosmos.DefaultComm.__roomMessage: You notice {0} doing something out of the corner of your eye.
